title: UI Foundation: derived stats + status file protocol
description:
Foundation for both Ink and Gum UIs. Two key pieces:

1. DERIVED STATS: Remove inline stats from index.json. Create function that computes stats on-the-fly.

2. STATUS FILE PROTOCOL: Ralph writes state to /tmp/ralph-status-$$.json for UIs to watch.

Status file format:
```json
{"state": "running|cr_review|error|retry", "lastActivity": 1234567890, "error": null, "retryIn": 0}
```

This is the shared infrastructure that US-105 (Ink) and US-108 (Gum) both depend on.
